short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: provides quick access to the localized sites under *.atlassian.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage:

1. Install this Chrome Extension
2. Open a CAC page such as https://confluence.atlassian.com/cloud/support-policies-and-reference-information-744721658.html
3. Open a context menu and select "[iAC] Toggle the language switch"
4. Then you will get redirected to the translated or original page corresponding to the current URL


Supported Sites and Languages:

- www.atlassian.com/* ←→ www.atlassian.com/ja/*
- confluence.atlassian.com/* ←→ ja.confluence.atlassian.com/*
- support.atlassian.com/* ←→ support.atlassian.com/ja/*
